corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: Perhaps the rather strict parson would not approve of her travelling so far on a Sunday .

Argentina 's president approves negotiations between Argentina and Iran on nuclear supply contracts .

THE German Federal Cartel Office has approved Krupps ' takeover of its steels rival Hoesch , after Krupp promised to sell its auto-suspension operations .
